nodes.title: Build API Integration Layer
nodes.body:
Create a comprehensive API integration layer for external services.

This epic tracks all features needed for robust API integration.

nodes.title: Rate Limiting
nodes.body: Add rate limiting and retry logic

nodes.title: Implement OAuth token refresh
nodes.body: Handle automatic token refresh when tokens expire

nodes.title: Add authentication tests
nodes.body: Unit and integration tests for auth module

nodes.title: Implement exponential backoff
nodes.body: Add exponential backoff for rate limit errors
